Metadata: program reports (annual, progress, planning reports, etc)

Washington Sea Grant (WSG) organizes its activities around four core programs: Research, Outreach, Education and Communications. This strategic plan details the goals and strategies for each of the four program areas. It identifies critical regional needs and establishes WSG's direction for the next five years. Finally, it articulates guidelines for program planning, implementation and evaluation, including work planning and reporting and the process for soliciting, evaluating and selecting competitive research projects.
